price: He said, “I am not such to prostrate before a human whom You created from sounding clay, made of aging mud.[14]”
arabic: قَالَ لَمۡ أَكُن لِّأَسۡجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقۡتَهُۥ مِن صَلۡصَٰلٖ مِّنۡ حَمَإٖ مَّسۡنُونٖ
footnotes: [14] He said: “I am better than him; You created me from fire and created him from clay.” See 7:12.
